entry.title: Gitlab 500 error
entry.content: Gitlab error 500In /var/log/gitlab/gitlab-rails/application.log 12345Completed 500 Internal Server Error in 63msNoMethodError (undefined method `reduce' for false:FalseClass): app/models/commit.rb:26:in `diff_line_count' app/controllers/projects/merge_requests_controller.rb:94:in `new' we can find some solutions through Google.com.But sometime we need to get it from logs.Let’s look into more logs. In githost.log 123August 22, 2017 17:14 -> ERROR -> Command failed [128]: /opt/gitlab/embedded/bin/git --git-dir=/var/opt/gitlab/git-data/gitlab-satellites/java/project/.git checkout -b __parking_branchfatal: Not a git repository: '/var/opt/gitlab/git-data/gitlab-satellites/java/project/.git' It tell us that it’s not a git repository..It’s clear.And I found it’s really not a git repository.Then I fixed it. 1.Delete this project 2.ran a git clone ~/repositories/<upstream_repo>/<repo_name>.git

entry.title: HomeBrew install plugins
entry.content: 1.Set default app in OS Xhomebrew install duti 1brew install duti get app id 1osascript -e 'id of app "$appName"' set default app 1duti -s $app-id .$file-type all
